DOC.brief_summary: Compare efficacy safety handpieces 755nm Alexandrite laser treatment scar .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Histological Evaluation 755nm Alexandrite Laser With Handpiece Treatment Scars
DOC.criteria: 1 . Is healthy male female 18 85 year old 2 . Has unwanted scar include atrophic scar wish undergo laser treatment . 3 . Is willing consent participate study . 4 . Is willing comply requirement study include biopsy , photograph , follow post treatment care attend treatment follow visit . 5 . Has Fitzpatrick skin type I IV . 1 . The subject female pregnant , pregnant within last 3 month , currently breast feed plan pregnancy study period . 2 . The subject hypersensitive light exposure OR take photo sensitized medication . 3 . The subject active localize systemic infection . 4 . The subject coagulation disorder currently use anticoagulation medication ( include limit heavy aspirin therapy { great 81 mg per day } ) . 5 . The subject condition , investigator 's opinion , would make unsafe subject participate research study . 6 . The subject currently enrol investigational drug device trial , receive investigational drug treat investigational device within 3 month prior enter study . 7 . The subject use Accutane within 6 month prior enrollment . 8 . The subject need expose artificial tanning device excessive sunlight trial . 9 . The subject prior treatment parenteral gold therapy ( gold sodium thiomalate ) . 10 . The subject history keloid . 11 . The subject evidence compromise wound heal . 12 . The subject history squamous cell carcinoma melanoma . 13 . The subject history immunosuppression/immune deficiency disorder ( include HIV infection AIDS ) use immunosuppressive medication . 14 . The subject allergy lidocaine epinephrine .
